title: Murder warrant issued for Tulsa shooting death
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
TULSA, Okla. - Quick Facts:
Tulsa Police want to arrest 27-year-old Marcus Boyd
They believe he was involved in the shooting death of Daniel Carter
The shooting happened June 28 on Virgin Street near Madison; it caused a wreck
Anyone with information should call Crime Stoppers a t918-596-2677, The Homicide Tip Line at 918 798 8477 or email homicide@cityoftulsa.org
A suspected killer is now wanted for murder.
Tulsa police say Marcus Boyd, 27, shot and killed Daniel Carter, 17, in June.
Homicide sergeant Dave Walker says Carter was riding shotgun in an SUV with four other people when the shooting happened near Virgin and Marshal Street.
Carter was shot in chest and killed, a 16-year-old girl was also shot, but survived.
Police believe the murder was in response to a prior shooting in June.
Walker says Boyd has been involved in murder investigations before and needs to be in prison.
